Title: Dungeon Dive
Description: Dungeon Dive is a 3d dungeon crawl that utilizes Python scripting (via IronPython) to handle level generation and monster behaviour, making it possible for users to easily modify these aspects of the game.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Dungeon Dive is a 3d dungeon crawl that utilizes Python scripting (via IronPython) to handle level generation and monster behaviour, making it possible for users to easily modify these aspects of the game.
